byline.original: By JEFFREY CANE and BEN PROTESS

lead_paragraph: Roberto J. Gonzalez, a former deputy general counsel of the Treasury Department, had earlier worked at the Consumer Financial Bureau and as an associate White House counsel.

headline.main: Treasury Lawyer to Join Paul Weiss Law Firm
